name: requestfunction
description: This function allows the assistant to request access to abilities. It is called when a request is best handled with the extra functionality

function.description:
browser:connects the assistant to a web browser
planoutput:Allows the assistant to output a plan
runshell:allows the agent to run commands in the shell. Eg. if the AI needs the current time or host IP or any information it can get via a simple shell or python script, it can call runshell to create and run a script to get that information.
search:search allows the assistant to search for information.
